pullrequest.title: Fix SimbodyUniversalJoint and add test for universal joints

content.raw:
you're right, the reference frame stuff is not related to the enums.  I guess I meant to say:

*the addition of enums made the ambiguities of reference frames definitions for returns of `GetAxis()` function calls more obvious...*

Which means it's a good addition  :-)
content.html:
you're right, the reference frame stuff is not related to the enums. I guess I meant to say:

the addition of enums made the ambiguities of reference frames definitions for returns of GetAxis() function calls more obvious...

Which means it's a good addition :-)
